label: Savings Account
description: A standard savings account with monthly compound interest.

label: P2P reinvest into savings
description: A peer to peer loan asset where the monthly repayments are invested into a savings account.

label: P2P reinvest into P2P
description: A peer to peer loan asset where the monthly repayments are invested into more peer to peer loan assets.

label: P2P with no reinvest
description: A peer to peer loan asset where there are no reinvestments of the monthly repayments. (This is not recommended but included for comparison.)
